pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, February 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Munich, Germany

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Security and Literature Series event with Canadian author Kim Thúy.

Café Oskar Maria, Ground Floor
Literaturhaus

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet the United States Congressional Delegation led by the Senator from South Carolina and Chair of the Senate Judiciary Committee, Lindsey Graham.

Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet the Prime Minister of Albania, Edi Rama.

Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet the Chairman of Saab, Marcus Wallenberg.

Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Niger, Brigi Rafini.

Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Munich Security Conference opening session.

Festsaal Room, Ground Floor
Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Official photographer only and host broadcaster

3:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a panel discussion.

Festsaal Room, Ground Floor
Bayerischer Hof Hotel

Note for media:

  • Official photographer only and host broadcaster

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Conference Hall, Ground Floor
HypoVereinsbank press briefing building

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

10:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Munich Airport

Closed to media.
